website_summaries.verdict: A prime choice for a taller boot style, this is a great everyday boot that tends to run a bit large.
pros: Owners rave about beautiful style, warmth, and comfort
Great everyday boots that pair with almost anything
cons: A few owners say this style runs on the large side
Some have problems with the construction of the lining

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I love these boots! They are so comfortable. I read the reviews before I bought them and knew they might be a tad bit loose, but there is plenty of room for socks. I wore them one day for a couple of hours and then brought them with me to a convention I had to attend. I wore them all day and evening and they were very comfortable, no sore feet at the end of the night. I usually buy all my shoes with good arch support, these do not have any but I had no problems at all. I would definitely buy these again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The color is gray and a deeper beautiful color. I wore them and they feel good ...
customer_reviews.text: The color is gray and a deeper beautiful color. I wore them and they feel good on and were comfortable. I have larger calves so I didn't button the top button. As they break in and suede stretches I will try buttoning. I just didn't want to risk breaking the elastic. The quality and fit were excellent.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Ashman

customer_reviews.title: but have no traction and are of poor quality. My wife bought these 13 months ago ...
customer_reviews.text: These boots are warm, but have no traction and are of poor quality. My wife bought these 13 months ago and with only occasional wear they're coming apart. She pulled them on today and one tore open(see picture). At $60 they were not a good value as they barely lasted a year, the Tevas she wears more frequently are 5 years old and in better shape. I would avoid these boots unless you want to buy new ones annually :(
customer_reviews.author: annonymous

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe, slightly wide for a slender woman
customer_reviews.text: I'm a tall and slender person and I have previously owned bear paws. They're great and the only reason I give them 4 stars instead of 5 is that they tend to run a bit wide on me. This is something that I encounter with most boots as my calves again are slender. Otherwise the length from heel to toe is perfect and they are super soft and fluffy!
customer_reviews.author: Nurse Ash

customer_reviews.title: These are a shade of green?
customer_reviews.text: They feel nice but are a half size too big because they don't sell half sizes. Got a Sz 10 for 9.5 foot. Will wear thick socks. Color is odd...sage? Looks more like gray, even next to some of my gray boots, though when contrasting, you can see the sage color. Without contrast, they appear gray. Would have liked true olive color if they had that. keeping cause I like Bearpaw and they'll do and are good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Anniebirdd

customer_reviews.title: Relay bad and unsafe product.
customer_reviews.text: After wearing it twice on dry no snow weather conditions, the sole of the boot came off, almost completely unglued on the right foot, and about half way through on the left. I took a very bad fall because of it. Fortunately I didn't get hurt, although some of my clothing were damaged on the fall. Needless to say I am very disappointed. I have other bearpaw boots and never had such a problem before, but now I'm afraid to wear any.
customer_reviews.author: Ana

customer_reviews.title: They also don't have excellent arch support but there is enough between your foot ...
customer_reviews.text: I said that these boots are somewhat wide, but I have a very narrow foot...so they probably will fit as expected for the average foot. I wear thick socks since I live in very cold country and so bought a size 9 even though I wear a size 8. They also don't have excellent arch support but there is enough between your foot and the ground that they feel good even without the high arch support. They are very warm and even though I'm not outside a lot in the winter, my feet are never cold when I am outside. I love Bearpaw boots and these live up to their reputation!
customer_reviews.author: Kibbles

customer_reviews.title: love the boots
customer_reviews.text: I love these boots!!!! It was the best buy this winter for me. These boots have been my winter slippers in the house. I also put my orthotic inserts in them (I have high arches and need extra support in all shoes) and walk around in them all day out of the house. Best of all they are vegan and therefore cruelty free! I feel good wearing boots where no animal had to be harmed to make them!
customer_reviews.author: Molly Bartram

customer_reviews.title: Cute and warm shin height boots
customer_reviews.text: Very attractive, comfortable, and warm winter boots. I really love the button fasteners, they have a cute little logo and a great feel. These are definitely comfortable enough to wear all day and my feet don't really sweat in them. They have an actual rubber sole that's tall enough so you don't worry about stomping through a puddle or walking in the snow. Really soft inside and they look great, the color is dead on to the picture you see.
customer_reviews.author: The High Corporation

customer_reviews.title: Super Boots!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love these boots! The color is a great darker shade of purple, not too bright but not terribly dark either. I have received multiple compliments on the color alone. They are also very warm, just as you would expect form Bearpaw. I live in Chicago, IL and although I am freezing every where else, my feet are toasty warm. The buckles/buttons on the side are fashionable and I think they add a nice touch to the boots. I wear these all day and I don't have any problems, but be aware that because I have flat feet I can't comment on arch support since I don't need it. These are my favorite pair of boots that I have owned!
customer_reviews.author: Lanette

customer_reviews.title: Love, love
customer_reviews.text: Love, love, love these boots, warm and snuggly soft. So comfortable and the green color is perfect with my new coat. Can't beat the price, would definitely buy again. Where else can you find "green" boots? Thank you Amazon for a great product!
customer_reviews.author: Antoinette L. Pribnow

customer_reviews.title: Love bear paw boots and I'm enjoying yet another pair ...
customer_reviews.text: Love bear paw boots and I'm enjoying yet another pair this year in Charcoal Gray...They are very comfortable and warm for chilly winter days...Very satisfied...I just wanted to add I wear them all time at work and out doors all this winter...Was washing my car today and boots kept my feet nice and dry and because I have a really good swade shoe protector my boots were safe from water spots...I have worn them all winter in the snow too and my feet have stayed nice and warm no wet...I'd buy yet a third pair in the future...I have them in the Carmel Color too.
customer_reviews.author: JB

customer_reviews.title: In love <3, I am obsess with them
customer_reviews.text: Got them as a gift. In love <3, I am obsess with them. True to color, the inside super cosy and keeps you warm. Because the are in a light color you have to be careful and be aware of your surroundings so you don't stain them because despite of wearing a sealer they will be stained and it is a bit hard to take out the stain.
customer_reviews.author: pedro castillo

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: I bought the size I normally use in other stores and it was perfect. So soft and warm and snuggly. My job requires that I drop medication off to different buildings in the facility I work in regardless of weather and they took knee high snow like a boss. Requires a little bit of TLC as far as care but I promise it really is worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Where price and quality intersect.
customer_reviews.text: These boots are worth the money, the quality is there. I have owned several pairs of sheepskin boots in various price points and these intersect at the best quality/price point I can find. These have an slight purple-ish gray color. They are a little wide and would comfortably fit someone with a fatter, wider foot. If you have a narrow foot you might want to go down a size maybe. They are like walking on clouds but you know they are also really warm. Definitely hoping to get more than a year of use out of them so I sprayed with water protectant spray and they continued to look just fine.
customer_reviews.author: LIZ

customer_reviews.title: They are much less expensive but still a great look. I have a bit wider calves so ...
customer_reviews.text: I had UGGS and then had my son. My feet grew so I sold them but still wanted a boot similar to them in a larger size. The Bear Paws fit the bill. They are much less expensive but still a great look. I have a bit wider calves so I went with the button version. I love them. They fit perfectly, are very comfortable and keep my feet toasty warm. Especially when I don't want to wear my Sorels. I love in snow country and so far they are wonderful. I recommend them over the high priced UGGS any day.
customer_reviews.author: Pokedot21

customer_reviews.title: Like Uggs Without  the high price tag
customer_reviews.text: Love the look of these. Like Uggs, without the high price tag. Very stylish, and really comfortable. Made in China, but now it seems so are most Uggs. For those prices that is a deal breaker. This brand is really well made and holding up quite well. Very happy with this purchase. Mine are true to size.
customer_reviews.author: BA

customer_reviews.title: Love them, fit perfectly based on my normal shoe size
customer_reviews.text: Love them! Ordered them because they were Grey and liked the way they looked. Fit perfectly and have a great strong sole. Warm but not too warm. Would order more in different colors. They are very stiff when you first wear them. But after one or two times they were fine!
customer_reviews.author: Heather P

customer_reviews.title: i love this boot
customer_reviews.text: i love this boot, only problem is when i ordered this color and style and they were only in whole sizes so i ordered an 8 instead of a 7 and a half, fit a little big but it is so comfortable itll be perfect with warm socks. or boot toppers.
customer_reviews.author: Desiree

customer_reviews.title: Love them
customer_reviews.text: Got them in 2017 still going strong and I am not babying them at all I wear in blizzard in rain after treating them of course but I have games some weight and they have gaps where the air gets in when they are fastened but that's my fault any ways I still love them
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: BearPaw boots
customer_reviews.text: These were a little too big. I take a 10 in a boot and sometimes an 11 depending on the way the boot is made. All shoes, sneakers and boots are all made different. Sometimes you try on a size 9 and that might be your size, but you try on the 10 and if might be a little loose but it feels better on your foot. So I sent these back and I got the 10 which is a better fit for me.
customer_reviews.author: Jersey Karen

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous boots
customer_reviews.text: The gray is such a pretty color and these are so warm and comfy. They fit true to size but need to be waterproofed before wear. These will also last longer if you don't wear them out on wet days since salt stains sheepskin boots.
customer_reviews.author: Hannah

customer_reviews.title: Amazing warmth and comfort
customer_reviews.text: Fits well, Well made, thick sole I wear them outside with no problems. Thick cushioned lining, that keeps my legs warm on cold damp mornings. My girlfriends are each getting a pair they love mine!
customer_reviews.author: Beach Gal

customer_reviews.title: Love, love, love!
customer_reviews.text: I am a huge Bearpaws fan and these do not disappoint. They fit true to size and are comfy. I'd read reviews saying there might be a gap for those with larger calves (guilty!) but I did not find that issue to be true for me. Definitely a great purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Dani's Mommy

customer_reviews.title: Good boots, just not proper fit for me
customer_reviews.text: I returned these boots immediately after receiving them. The shaft of the boots was too large for me in the ankle area. I didn't like them as much as the UGG knockoffs I purchased at Costco. I gave a 4 star rating despite this because the boots appear to be well made. Just not exactly what I had hoped with regard to fit on my foot and leg.
customer_reviews.author: GP Swaney

customer_reviews.title: Daughter loves, loves these boots.  now I want a pair!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter LOVES these boots she got for Christmas. She has worn them just about everyday since. Fit well and appear to be holding up well. Got her the Bearpaw care kit to go with them and seems to be helping keep them conditioned.
customer_reviews.author: Greek Goddess

customer_reviews.title: Love my Bearpaws!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these boots after researching them on this site and others. I needn't a waterproof, warm pair of comfortable boots. These boots are great. The fit is great - a little loose but I wanted to be able to wear warmer socks, and I can. They are warm! I spent 12 hours in 20° weather, standing on asphalt, and my foot stayed warm. I did spray the boots well with Camp Dry to help with the waterproofing. It darkened them a little but I am fine with that. That look great with skinny jeans and boot - cut jeans. I love them and would buy them again!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful but on the larger size
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful & exactly what I wanted but fit large. I usually buy bear paw in 7 and Im a 7 1/2. My last pair was a different style and a 7 and was snug and stretched out to be perfect. Knowing that they stretch I re-ordered a 6. Im crossing my fingers that going down a full size in this style will work. My advice order a size down.
customer_reviews.author: Customer 777

customer_reviews.title: A Winner Everytime!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these again for my granddaughter.... this is her third pair. She loves them! I get her a pair each year for the winter season. They fit her perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: slimjam

customer_reviews.title: They are gorgeous and look like big sisters boots
customer_reviews.text: They are gorgeous and look like big sisters boots. The genuine suede and sherpa lining is so plush and soft, she would wear them 24/7 if we would let her. I ordered a size up, as recommended by the reviews because of the lining, and they are perfect. Much nicer than we had expected or hoped for.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Keller

customer_reviews.title: ... ordered many Bearpaw boots over the years and been satisfied with how they hold up
customer_reviews.text: I have ordered many Bearpaw boots over the years and been satisfied with how they hold up, especially considering the price versus the price of Uggs . This time around, however, I am completely dissatisfied with the product. Shearling is NOT supposed to smell, and after just a few weeks my daughter's boots and feet smell so badly that they are unbearable. And the wool inside has completely matted flat, which makes the boots look old and ratty. Turns out Bearpaws aren't sheepskin; they're cow hide. That explains a lot. I won't be buying another pair.
customer_reviews.author: Georgiapeach1974

customer_reviews.title: I love these boots
customer_reviews.text: I love these boots!!!! They are warm and comfy. I plan to look into a Scotchguard coating to protect from moisture and staining. These are a fabulous alternative to Uggs for those of us that don't want to drop that much cash or risk ordering a "knock off" boot. I bought these on a recomendation from a friend and I would absolutely recommend them to others!!
customer_reviews.author: ps-allentown

customer_reviews.title: Not bad
customer_reviews.text: First may I say, I am a die hard fan of Uggs, have always owned them, and would not have tried these - but lets face it. Times are tough. Uggs have finally been priced out of my range. These are a fair imitation for the price. They are definately not the same. Especially the bottoms - not much rubber and basically flat. The real test will be how long they last. Only time will tell.
customer_reviews.author: MT

customer_reviews.title: Waterproof before wearing.
customer_reviews.text: I wear a women's size 6.5 wide to extra wide depending on the style. I bought these in a youth size 5 and they fit great. They are plenty wide even with the lining. These boots are warm ever wearing light weight socks. The boots are not waterproofed when you get them so waterproof before wearing.
customer_reviews.author: Maggie Hendrickson

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed, I cannot sew the buttons on because the ...
customer_reviews.text: Top button fell off after one month & middle button fell off in month two. My daughter wore these 1-2 times a week *maybe*! Very disappointed, I cannot sew the buttons on because the boots are so thick. And they're now too floppy for her to wear. Also the ankle part of this style is made to be very wide. I will not order them again.
customer_reviews.author: Jlup23

customer_reviews.title: The shape looks weird
customer_reviews.text: This boot like kind of weird. I think the shape of the foot looks kind of square-ish and bulky not to attractive Maybe its the color, because my daughter bought black and I love the way hers look
customer_reviews.author: amazonforlife

customer_reviews.title: Comfy boots!
customer_reviews.text: These are furry and comfy. I like them! Normally, I'm either a size 8 or 8.5. I went with an 8.5 and they seemed slightly big, like they were slipping off my heel some.... but im keeping them anyway.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous boots!
customer_reviews.text: Love these boots! Good-looking, Warm, comfortable. Saw me through full days outdoor in the snow last winter. I’d buy again in a heartbeat.
customer_reviews.author: Gwendolyn A Morgan

customer_reviews.title: I love my BEARPAW boots!
customer_reviews.text: I always order BearPaw boots in a size larger than I normally wear. I did that this time also, and they fit perfectly. I also followed the manufacturer advice and treated them with BEARPAW water and stain repellent. I haven't worn them very much yet, but so far so good.
customer_reviews.author: L Coy

customer_reviews.title: Not as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Bought these because in the picture they're a beautiful gray..Received a box that said they were what I ordered, but they were the wrong size (box said 6, boots said 5). Also, the charcoal color is black, not gray. I guess the shade of black may be lighter than the advertised black boots, but they were nowhere near any kind of gray color.
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: Well worth every penny I spent on them. First off these were half the price that they would be in the store which made them easier to buy. Second off they are so soft and warm. They hold their shape really well. I got the color olive and have gotten complements because it is not a normal color but they still go with almost everything.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Like them a lot. Especially like the color. Looking forward to wearing them during our snowy season.
customer_reviews.author: U. Wood

customer_reviews.title: Happy with the look and foot feel!
customer_reviews.text: I tried them on as soon as they came into the house...fit was great..happy I was able to get them in 8 as 7 1/2 wld have been too tight! I know from my other bear paws that they will be warm as toast to my feet!
customer_reviews.author: Betty

customer_reviews.title: defective!
customer_reviews.text: First time trying on these boots the top button popped off. This shouldn't be happening on $89 boots. I didn't even try on the other foot. I immediately started the return process. This is the first item I have ever returned an item to Amazon, and I use it often.
customer_reviews.author: Janice Geheran

customer_reviews.title: The perfect winter boot
customer_reviews.text: I love there boots! I normally wear a size 6.5; I bought these in a size 7 & they're perfect. I can even wear thick socks w/ them. If you normally wear a wide calf boot, then these boots will be a little smug @ the top but it doesn't affect the comfort of the boot. I'm thinking about buying another pair in another color.
customer_reviews.author: Shelly McKinney

customer_reviews.title: Nice comfy boots!
customer_reviews.text: Love my olive green bearpaw.Was a bit concerned about the size 9, but my feet just slipped right in with even room.Nice soft interior!!!
customer_reviews.author: Kedeejah

customer_reviews.title: 5 stars
customer_reviews.text: fit well. They are very comfy and certainly keep my feet warm. I particularly love this pair because of its length. On a very cold and snowy day (I live in North Dakota, so somewhere cold enough that I can say what's winter proof LOL), this pair is my must-wear!
customer_reviews.author: JF60

customer_reviews.title: Gift Purchase
customer_reviews.text: I loved how fast the product arrived. It was exactly what my daughter was wanting for Christmas.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: This is my daughter's 2nd pair and she loves them!
customer_reviews.author: BACTN

customer_reviews.title: Great as usual.
customer_reviews.text: I have been wearing bearpaw products for decades and have always loved them. The reason for the rating is that I like boots with a taller shaft. I hope that the company notes this review or gets more of this kind of feedback.
customer_reviews.author: shirlgirl

customer_reviews.title: Completely satisfied
customer_reviews.text: Better than I had hoped! Warm, comfy, true to size. Actually, I have large calves and these boots even fit w jeans tucked in them! Appearance wise....they not hideous, pretty much Ugg-like. Meaning I look like I'm wearing potholders on my feet! But that's what you get with this type of boot. Real easy to slip on and off, but I don't wear them w socks so your results may vary.
customer_reviews.author: Lizzardo

customer_reviews.title: Nice boots
customer_reviews.text: I got this boots to wear it with different colors of jeans
customer_reviews.author: mumzy

customer_reviews.title: making them very comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: Well made and attractive, only drawback is there's little to no arch support. However, they're roomy enough for an orthotic insert, making them very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Shelley Ann K.

customer_reviews.title: I normally wear a 6. 5 but I follow ...
customer_reviews.text: I normally wear a 6.5 but I follow the instructions to size up if you wore half sizes and the fit is a bit large.
customer_reviews.author: lucky777

customer_reviews.title: Not like the adult version
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my daughter after owning two Lauren style bear paw boots for myself. I love the ones that I have because they are very thick and fluffy and keep my feet so warm. The children’s version is not the same. The inner fur lining wasn’t the same and became matted quickly. My daughter doesn’t like them at all. We will stick with the plain tall boot from bear paw.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: We'll see...
customer_reviews.text: I will change to 5 stars once the issue I have with the right boot is resolved. The sewing of the seam in the lining is not of the quality of the left boot and is rubbing my (right) foot raw. Problem was resolved in a timely manner.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: returned
customer_reviews.text: I loved the fit. Color bled though. They were beautiful. I returned due to color bleeding when wet.
customer_reviews.author: s_nlbauer

customer_reviews.title: which I don't mind at all and thought it looked good still too
customer_reviews.text: Get your regular size in shoes, that's what I did and it fit me perfectly. They're really cozy and worth it. The olive color is moreso an ashy green/sage color, which I don't mind at all and thought it looked good still too! Overall a great boot.
customer_reviews.author: yuliana

customer_reviews.title: Opening the box for the first time, the presentation ...
customer_reviews.text: Opening the box for the first time , the presentation was very disappointing . It looked as though they were used and the box was already opened , all the wrapping , the boots should’ve been in and the tags , were underneath the boots . The seam of the boot is VERY visible on the top instead of the Sherpa fur being visible to cover the seam. Not impressed AT ALL ....
customer_reviews.author: sunshine stone

customer_reviews.title: Boots straight from the Love of the Lord
customer_reviews.text: They must be! I love these boots so much!!!!!! I bought all three colors and love them all! So warm and comfy from day one! No breaking in at all needed!
customer_reviews.author: Toni O

customer_reviews.title: Vendor was great and shipping was fine
customer_reviews.text: Vendor was great and shipping was fine. A little disappointed that I Have had the bottom button fall off both boots . :( Did repair them....My Daughter still lvs them.
customer_reviews.author: Lou Lou

customer_reviews.title: The fit and comfort are the best. I had to put extensions on the loops ...
customer_reviews.text: The fit and comfort are the best. I had to put extensions on the loops to accommodate my short chunky legs. I like them very much. Well worth the cost.
customer_reviews.author: Judy

customer_reviews.title: Nice granddaughter loves these
customer_reviews.text: Read prior ratings and got 1.5 sizes larger than normal size. Measured foot and went by measurement in guide
customer_reviews.author: Virginia granny

customer_reviews.title: Love these bear paws
customer_reviews.text: Love these bear paws. I use to buy uggs all the time and to be honest I prefer these . Good price , good quality .
customer_reviews.author: sandi

customer_reviews.title: Loose toggles, but replacement is on its way
customer_reviews.text: I bought three pairs of Bearpaw Lauren Boots for my daughters for this winter in different colors. The girls like wearing them because of their warmth and comfort, but the issue we are running into are loose toggles. One of the toggles was already lost. (See photo.) However, you can order replacement toggles for free from the official Bearpaw website, which is very nice.
customer_reviews.author: nightowl

customer_reviews.title: Super warm, good, thick, flexible soles
customer_reviews.text: Just perfect house slippers, as expected! Don't wear them in snow! Only good for cold but dry weather - but super warm.
customer_reviews.author: HU7

customer_reviews.title: Picky Teenager Approved! :)
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these for my friends daughter as a gift. She is a really persnickety teenager and I was really nervous about if she would like them and fit! She LOVED them and the fit was perfect! They are cute and "teenager approved"!
customer_reviews.author: T. Walker

customer_reviews.title: i love these- BUT
customer_reviews.text: i love these- BUT... have a bit of trouble breaking them in yet as i want to be able to slip them on without socks and they are causing blisters when i do this.... have had for 1 month
customer_reviews.author: DarcyMB

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable and cozy
customer_reviews.text: Finally got my boots today. Can’t wait to try them on. Very comfortable and cozy. The color look just like the picture. I order them in olive and loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Look just like Mommy's UGGs!
customer_reviews.text: My 3 year old granddaughter loves them.. Look just like her Mommy's UGGs!
customer_reviews.author: Jerry

customer_reviews.title: great value and cute boots
customer_reviews.text: I love the boot. They are very cute and the quality is good. And the price is so much cheaper than Ugg. However, please order a size up because they run true to size. I normally wear a 7 so when I order a 7 they were a bit snug because of the lining. I had regretfully had to return them.
customer_reviews.author: Kt

customer_reviews.title: Favorites!
customer_reviews.text: Never wearing anything else on my feet- I've never been so cozy!
customer_reviews.author: MSB2M5

customer_reviews.title: Very cute
customer_reviews.text: Boots are super cute but one of the buttons on the side already fell off at school. Having a hard time finding something that will match so I can sew on a new one.
customer_reviews.author: KMK2CENTS

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: Love these. Beautiful boots. Bought these for one of my daughters they are as beautiful as MY uggs!
customer_reviews.author: JenD

customer_reviews.title: Loved my purchase of these boots so much
customer_reviews.text: Loved my purchase of these boots so much, that I bought a pair for my Sister and my Daughter also.
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie Brown

customer_reviews.title: her feet don't roll to the side like with other winter boots
customer_reviews.text: My 11 year old loves them, her feet don't roll to the side like with other winter boots. They do need to be waterproofed but that was pretty simple.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I get so many compliments on these boots and they are so comfortable
customer_reviews.author: Deborah DiGregorio

customer_reviews.title: Love these boots
customer_reviews.text: Love these boots! Ordered a half size smaller because when the fur gets smooshed down over time they fit different.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal Veldhuizen

customer_reviews.title: Basic White Girl Boots for Winter!
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I was looking for without the price tag of the larger name brand! Definitely buying new ones this year now that my feet have shrunk!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Jochen

customer_reviews.title: So comfy!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE these! So great! Color is perfect, quality is awesome! I love bear paw over uggs and the price is better! I have 3 pairs! Can't wait for my next!
customer_reviews.author: Erin

customer_reviews.title: Cheaper on Amazon!
customer_reviews.text: Ordered these on Amazon instead of buying them at the local sports store since the price was $20 cheaper here on Amazon. My 9 year old daughter loves them and has been wearing them everyday. Holding up good so far.
customer_reviews.author: Stacy Madsen

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: want to return but have no paperwork to send back!! Dont fit right!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Finally was able to purchase them and I love them. I do not have any trouble tucking ...
customer_reviews.text: Had my eyes on these boots for awhile. Finally was able to purchase them and I love them. I do not have any trouble tucking in jeans, they are warm and comfortable. Even though I have high arches, my feet did not hurt at all after wearing them for 8 straight hours at work.
customer_reviews.author: D. Maberry

customer_reviews.title: fit great and look good
customer_reviews.text: I gave these to my daughter for Christmas. She loves them. These are her new go-to foot wear for running errands. They are warm, fit great and look good. She's happy, I'm happy.
customer_reviews.author: Donelle Druivenga

customer_reviews.title: Love it. My new favorite boot
customer_reviews.text: Love it. My new favorite boot. Buy your normal boot size ppl. You just gotta break them in and they’re great
customer_reviews.author: Just me

customer_reviews.title: I loved these boots and for $50 can beat it
customer_reviews.text: I loved these boots and for $50 can beat it. Just as comphy as my Uggs but half the price. Tall and plush and needed a gray pair. LOVE EM
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Comfy, warm, and totally adorable!
customer_reviews.text: Love Bearpaw's!! The longer I break these boots in, the better they get. Super warm. I stand all day at work in these boots and my feet don't hurt. Happy purchase for me! ♡☆♡
customer_reviews.author: Wonder Stone Creations

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!!
customer_reviews.text: I am in love!! The. Olor and fit are perfect!! Couldn't believe I found purple In My size!! Been a bear paw buyer for years!!!
customer_reviews.author: Gmahoney61

customer_reviews.title: Bearpaw boots
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable. Haven't worn them out cuz i dont want to ruin them. I love them just wish they had black in stock. Never buying cheap boots again
customer_reviews.author: K.la_thebarber

customer_reviews.title: I wear without socks and they feel like slippers.
customer_reviews.text: So amazingly warm. I wear without socks and they feel like slippers.
customer_reviews.author: Trisha

customer_reviews.title: Returned and got a different pair of Bearpaws that I am much happier with.
customer_reviews.text: The boots were too tight and too high. Returned and got a different pair of Bearpaws that I am much happier with.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Strong

customer_reviews.title: ... pair of Bear Paw boots that I've owned - love them! Color
customer_reviews.text: This is the second pair of Bear Paw boots that I've owned - love them! Color, quality and durability.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I love these boots, they fit perfect and great price! :))
customer_reviews.author: Kayla C.

customer_reviews.title: Love the color though
customer_reviews.text: Kinda a lil stiff.. Don't lk that. Love the color though. Folding over is not working because of stiffness of the material. Sooo. Definitely not a fav of mine.
customer_reviews.author: AWSOME GAME

customer_reviews.title: disappointed in the quality
customer_reviews.text: I have been so unhappy since getting these boots. They are very cute and warm, however, the buttons on the side keep falling off. I'm not doing any rough work with them, the first one fell off on the second day! I couldn't even sew it back on myself, I had to take them to a local tailor. I really wanted to love these boots but I'm disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Comfy warm and stylish, just wish they had arch support
customer_reviews.text: Great shoes! Very comfy, warm, and luxurious feeling. However, the bottom of the shoe is as flat as a pancake, so especially for those of us with high arches, the arch support is lacking. However, this can be fixed with arch support inserts, though it would be nice not to have to worry about that. The button closures are adorable and secure. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Shannon

customer_reviews.title: She loves them and the color is very pretty. As for the arch support
customer_reviews.text: Got these for my daughter. She loves them and the color is very pretty. As for the arch support....they are basically flat....but she says they are still very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Love2Read

customer_reviews.title: Not bad for the $
customer_reviews.text: These fit well enough. I have to leave the top toggle undone because of my large calves. I normally wear a 7.5 but ordered these in an 8 because of the lining. They are definitely warm.
customer_reviews.author: enviedkisses

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great boot for the price we paid! Daughter loves them!
customer_reviews.author: KJS0914

customer_reviews.title: My daughter hardly wore these and soles cracked on both boots
customer_reviews.text: Product was total garbage. I believe might have been imitation boot. Boots hardly worn and sole cracked on side of one boot. Other boot even worse, huge cracks in center of sole
customer_reviews.author: The Mav

product_meta.title: BEARPAW Women's Lauren Tall Winter Boot
product_meta.description:
The women's 12" tall Lauren is a fan favorite! featuring a triple toggle closure, it's easy to pull on and off, and your feet will stay protected and comfortable cradled in a sheepskin foot bed and cozy wool blend lining. we love Lauren!

Bearpaw Footwear is made for comfort with contemporary style. Our footwear is made from quality materials that provide an organic beauty that's wearable year round.
